sentence: Stayed for three days in late January and were impressed with the friendly staff wonderful accommodations nice pool and hot tub and great location for touring the SD area
Pool and Jacuzi are excellent
Pool and spa very clean and refreshing Breakfast
The staff was very helpful from Olga at the front desk to the maintenance man who wiped down the chairs and tables by the pool

Loved this locationeasy walk to beach and the hot tub and pool were very nicethe employees were all so helpful with directions and friendlythe su casa so close has great food and the little lunch and breakfast place ca nt remember name but was good and manderine house was good as weli went with a girl friend i hadbt seen in a long time to have some girl funenjoyed it so much i m going back in 5 weeks
swim pool is nice and clean
The jacuzi is lovely and the property is very near the beach
Pool and Jacuzi were fun for kids and I
I like the continental breakfast the pool the jacuzi but the lovely wonderful people who work there
Comfortable bed good free wifi nice pool good laundry facilities
The facility is currently undergoing renovations but it did not impact our stay other than the pool area was closed for a few of our days
Hotel was undergoing renovations so a lot of things were closed like the pool area ice machine and breakfast room
The hotel description says it is a boutique hotel with all year round pool which was a reason we booked it but the pool was set up as the builders yard
Let us use the showers by the pool after having checked out that day
They could redo the pool area as well
Motel style but very large rooms and small pool available
I was also looking forward to a little pool time but I did nt think the pool looked great
Bathroom need towel rack and hooks to hang towels and swim wear
We enjoyed swimming in the pool as the weather was quite hot in Sept However the pool area is small and not very appealing but the water is clean
Since we only stayed one night we did not have time to enjoy the pool area but it looked clean and very inviting
